lines.speaker: George
lines.text: I can see into your room.

lines.speaker: George
lines.text: You sure aren't doing your homework.

lines.speaker: George
lines.text: How about giving me answers to the math?

lines.speaker: Emily
lines.text: Text me. I have to get these algorithms right for a tractor beam. You know, teleportation?

lines.speaker: George
lines.text: Beam me up, Scotty. Or do I have to use my imaginagion?

lines.speaker: George
lines.text: Anyway the moon's so bright who can work?

lines.speaker: Emily
lines.text: The moon will set soon enough.

lines.speaker: George
lines.text: It's Dad. I have to go.

lines.speaker: Emily
lines.text: If I send you the answers, you'll do something for me, won't you?
